name: KtPaperGui
description: A high level library for creating Paper plugins. Create advanced guis flawlessly with the kotlin dsl, with signals. Features commands, events, components, scoreboards, scheduling and more! I've always encountered issues when using other libraries for guis in Bukkit, and decided to make my own with Essential.gg's gui library as inspiration.

name: Iris
description: A scalable architecture for my Minecraft server, PvPHub. It allows for multiple backend servers to connect together seemlessly with a strong API to help make more advanced features!

name: Graphite
description: Web interface to view player's pvp stats, kits and more.

name: Playerkits
description: Private, high-level plugin for PvPHub compiled using KtPaperGui. Allows players to create kits with high customization and features.

name: Events
description: High level plugin for hosting in-game events. Extremely cutomizable, allowing any player to choose how the event runs and manage it along the way.

name: ReconnectVelocity
description: Velocity plugin that saves the last connected server of your players and attempts to reconnect them when rejoining. Very extensive customization options.

name: NameTags
description: PaperMC plugin aimed at replacing players' nametags with much more stylish and customizable text-display entities. It provides a powerful and extensible API for developer usage, as well as javadocs and a small wiki.

name: Portfolio
description: The website you're on now, created using plain HTML/CSS/JS and some jQuery because I don't hate my life that much. Have you found any little secrets yet?
